name: CastleClysmic
description:
A short 1-4 player local multiplayer game that took just over 3 months to build.

Explore a castle overrun by goblins and bumble your way to victory through combat and platforming challenges.

My first real game Iv'e put on the internet

there are 15 levels and 2 boss fights.

any feedback is helpful

you can find the music on sound cloud

https://soundcloud.com/user-956987101/chill-castle
